DOC.brief_summary: Preliminary imaging study test future use MRI-imaging evaluate anti-angiogenesis treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Testing New Method Analyzing MR Images
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study develop evaluate new MR imaging technique protocols non-invasive monitor anti-angiogenesis treatment breast cancer . This feasibility study preliminary imaging study test image protocol subject already undergo MR clinical purpose . The specific objective research study develop validate MRI functional MRI data acquisition method , task paradigm , post-processing technique ensure reliability result . The information derive research intend applied future study subject undergoing experimental anti-angiogenesis drug therapy .
DOC.criteria: Females Age 18 year great Undergoing breast MRI exam Pregnancy Contraindication MRI standard screen checklist clinically indicated examination ( i.e . metal devices/implants ; history claustrophobia ) History/presence follow breast : injury ; breast implant ; surgical interventional procedure ; clinically significant abnormality
